title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2342/78 of 6 October 1978 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1993/78 concerning measures to develop the use and consumption of milk products of Community origin outside the Community through technical and/or commercial assistance
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2342/78  of 6 October 1978  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1993/78 concerning measures to develop the use and consumption of milk products of Community origin outside the Community through technical and/or commercial assistance
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 3 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1993/78, "1 November 1978" is replaced by "1 December 1978".

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 October 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 131, 26.5.1977, p. 6. (2)OJ No L 130, 18.5.1978, p. 11. (3)OJ No L 230, 22.8.1978, p. 8.
